title: Not getting mastery tokens

embed.description: LSU student / Diamond 3 0LP / 157W 135L Win Ratio 54% / Hecarim - 42W 20L Win Ratio 68%, Graves - 39W 15L Win Ratio 72%, Lee Sin - 30W 22L Win Ratio 58%, Nunu - 20W 17L Win Ratio 54%, Gragas - 18W 12L Win Ratio 60%

body:
Is there a limit to how many mastery tokens you can get in a day? While playing on SUMMONER'S RIFT (Ranked flex) I have 2 games in a row on Lee Sin with an S followed by an S-. I have only recieved 1 mastery token. I would like some clarification as to why I don't have 2 mastery tokens. I have linked my match history for proof. Thanks

-LSU

replies.body: Sometimes it just takes a little bit for that match history to be correctly updated to our servers, which seems to be the case here since I'm not yet able to see that game on our end. Give it a day or so, and if you still don't have the other mastery token hit me back up or reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Just additional information:

I am mastery 6 with Lee Sin. Both games were ranked flex SR. This has happened with multiple champions and I thought it was just a drop rate, but after doing more research it is apparently supposed to happen with every S after level 5. So I just want to know if my account is bugged or why I'm not properly getting shards!
